Posts.Content: Over the last few weeks. I have had pain in My rightbreast Under the Nipple and it feelsa lumpy compaired to the left one. No Lump under arm. But feels lumpy. And right breast feels sore to touch. I am worried due to the fact that My Mum had breast Cancer as well as My Auntie. Should I be worried? I am also Diabetic and suffer seizures and get lots of Bone pains.
Posts.Title: Pain in The right breast
